mutants.code:
def can_make_strings_equal(s: str, t: str, n: int) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if two strings s and t of length n can be made equal by performing exactly one swap 
    between characters in s and t.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The first string.
    t (str): The second string.
    n (int): The length of the strings.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the strings can be made equal with one swap, False otherwise.
    """
    i = c = 1
    a = b = ''
    while c < 4 and i < n:
        if s[i] != t[i]:
            c += 1
            a += s[i]
            b += t[i]
        i += 1
    if c == 2 and len(set(a)) == len(set(b)) == 1:
        return True
    else:
        return False

def can_make_strings_equal(s: str, t: str, n: int) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if two strings s and t of length n can be made equal by performing exactly one swap 
    between characters in s and t.

    t (str): The second string.
    n (int): The length of the strings.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the strings can be made equal with one swap, False otherwise.
    """
    i = c = -1
    a = b = ''
    while c < 4 and i < n:
        if s[i] != t[i]:
            c += 1
            a += s[i]
            b += t[i]
        i += 1
    if c == 2 and len(set(a)) == len(set(b)) == 1:
        return True
    else:
        return False

def can_make_strings_equal(s: str, t: str, n: int) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if two strings s and t of length n can be made equal by performing exactly one swap 
    between characters in s and t.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The first string.
    t (str): The second string.
    n (int): The length of the strings.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the strings can be made equal with one swap, False otherwise.
    """
    i = c = 0

        if s[i] != t[i]:
            c += -1
            a += s[i]
            b += t[i]
        i += 1
    if c == 2 and len(set(a)) == len(set(b)) == 1:
        return True
    else:
        return False

def can_make_strings_equal(s: str, t: str, n: int) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if two strings s and t of length n can be made equal by performing exactly one swap 
    between characters in s and t.

    Parameters:
    s (str): The first string.
    t (str): The second string.
    n (int): The length of the strings.

    Returns:
    bool: True if the strings can be made equal with one swap, False otherwise.
    """
    i = c = 0
    a = b = ''
    while c < 4 and i < n:
        if s[i] != t[i]:
            c += 1
            a += s[i]
            b += t[i]
        i += 1
    if c == 3 and len(set(a)) == len(set(b)) == 1:
        return True
    else:
        return False
